passages.text: You are standing in the middle of a large grass field. You have never been this place. There is an old lady crouching next to a bonefire near you. In a far distance, you see a small village. On the other side, you see a forest.
passages.name: Field_1

passages.text:
You step closer the old lady. She is very thin. Looks like she is in hunger.

The old lady says: "Hello young man, I... I haven't eaten anything in 3 days. Perhaps you could spare some food to this old woman?"

(You realize that you are still holding a bag of chips.)
passages.name: Bonefire

passages.text: You are standing in the middle of a small village. You see medieval houses made of wood, hey, and some rough stones. You see a tavern called "Old Tybalt's Tavern". You also see a relatively tall building that looks like a townhall. A sign says there is a market place on the South.
passages.name: Village

passages.text:
You gave some food to the old lady. Now the old lady starts to cram the food into her mouth. In less than a minute, she finished the entire food.

"... Thank you so much." says the old lady.

The very next moment, her body started to radiate light and warmth. A ray of bright golden light blinds your eyes. When you opened your eyes again, a beautiful goddess was standing in front of you.

The goddess speaks to you with smile: "Oh good traveller, You have proven your warm and merciful heart. I am Ianne, the goddess of compassion. All virtues have forsaken from this land. But only a warm-hearted traveller like you can bring them back. Now, take this golden whistle and head towards the village that you can see there."

After finishing her words, the goddess turned into a bright golden light and disappeared.
passages.name: Meet_Ianne

passages.text: You are standing in the middle of a large grass field. In the far distance, you see a small village. On the other side, you see a forest.
passages.name: Field_2

passages.text: A medieval tavern. Drunk people are dancing to the music of bard's mandolin. Some are gambling. In the middle of the hall, there is a pot of stew (made of multiple unknown ingredients) boiling over a fire pit. You see a big guy serving drinks to his guests. He's probably Tybalt.
passages.name: Tavern

passages.text: A bulding made of nice stone bricks. Insdie the building you see a nice rug on the floor made of a deer's coat. Candles are keeping the room bright. You see a man sitting at the desk in front of you. He's writing something down on a very large book. Seems like he hasn't notice you yet.
passages.name: Town_Hall

passages.text: A deep forest densed with wood and tall grasses. You are trying your best not to lose the direction. Soon, you have found a path trail tiled with stone bricks. As you followed the trail, you have reached in front of a shrine.
passages.name: Forest

passages.text: An ancient shrine. You see a statue of Goddess. The face of the statue is damaged that you could not see her face. Below the statue, it is written, "Answer this: What motivatates the will to love, care, and sympathize?".
passages.name: Shrine_Of_Compassion

passages.text: You are at a market place. You see people moving around. Most of the goods doesn't look very interesting. You see some vegetables, meats, horseshoes, and a Gypsy woman sitting on a rug. Somehow you feel some mystical feeling towards her.
passages.name: Market
